verses.verse: וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> become בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִיעִ֗ית <WH7637> And it came to pass in the seventh בַּֽחֲמִשִׁי֙ <WH2549> in the fifth בֶּעָשׂ֣וֹר <WH6218> [month] the tenth לַחֹ֔דֶשׁ <WH2320> [day] of the month בָּ֧אוּ <WH935> came אֲנָשִׁ֛ים <WH582> [that] certain מִזִּקְנֵ֥י <WH2205> of the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לִדְרֹ֣שׁ <WH1875> to enquire אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיֵּשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> and sat לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> before ס
וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Then came the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֵלַ֥י <WH413> to me לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> unto me saying

בֶּן־ <WH1121> Son אָדָ֗ם <WH120> of man דַּבֵּ֞ר <WH1696> speak אֶת־ <WH853> זִקְנֵ֤י <WH2205> unto the elders יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3068> GOD הֲלִדְרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> to enquire אֹתִ֖י <WH853> אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you בָּאִ֑ים <WH935> Are ye come חַי־ <WH2416> of me? [As] I live אָ֙נִי֙ <WH589> I אִם־ <WH518> lo אִדָּרֵ֣שׁ <WH1875> I will not be enquired לָכֶ֔ם נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3068> GOD

הֲתִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <WH8199> Wilt thou judge אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> הֲתִשְׁפּ֖וֹט <WH8199> wilt thou judge בֶּן־ <WH1121> them son אָדָ֑ם <WH120> of man אֶת־ <WH853> תּוֹעֲבֹ֥ת <WH8441> the abominations אֲבוֹתָ֖ם <WH1> of their fathers הוֹדִיעֵֽם׃ <WH3045> [them]? cause them to know

וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> And say אֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH413> to כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֮ <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִה֒ <WH3069> GOD בְּיוֹם֙ <WH3117> In the day בָּחֳרִ֣י <WH977> when I chose בְיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וָאֶשָּׂ֣א <WH5375> and lifted up יָדִ֗י <WH3027> mine hand לְזֶ֙רַע֙ <WH2233> unto the seed בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יַֽעֲקֹ֔ב <WH3290> of Jacob וָאִוָּדַ֥ע <WH3045> and made myself known לָהֶ֖ם בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> unto them in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וָאֶשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> when I lifted יָדִ֤י <WH3027> up mine hand לָהֶם֙ לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> unto them saying אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> In the day הַה֗וּא <WH1931> which נָשָׂ֤אתִי <WH5375> [that] I lifted up יָדִי֙ <WH3027> mine hand לָהֶ֔ם לְהֽוֹצִיאָ֖ם <WH3318> unto them to bring them forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֶל־ <WH413> into אֶ֜רֶץ <WH776> into a land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> i תַּ֣רְתִּי <WH8446> that I had espied לָהֶ֗ם זָבַ֤ת <WH2100> for them flowing חָלָב֙ <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey צְבִ֥י <WH6643> which [is] the glory הִ֖יא <WH1931> which לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> of all lands

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> Then said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> about אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <WH8251> the abominations עֵינָיו֙ <WH5869> of his eyes הַשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <WH7993> I unto them Cast ye away וּבְגִלּוּלֵ֥י <WH1544> not yourselves with the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אַל־ <WH408> not תִּטַּמָּ֑אוּ <WH2930> and defile אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <WH4784> But they rebelled בִ֗י וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> nor אָבוּ֙ <WH14> against me and would לִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <WH8085> not hearken אֵלַ֔י <WH413> unto אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> unto me they did not every man אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁקּוּצֵ֤י <WH8251> the abominations עֵֽינֵיהֶם֙ <WH5869> of their eyes לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor הִשְׁלִ֔יכוּ <WH7993> cast away וְאֶת־ <WH853> גִּלּוּלֵ֥י <WH1544> the idols מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor עָזָ֑בוּ <WH5800> neither did they forsake וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ <WH8210> I will pour out חֲמָתִ֣י <WH2534> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> on לְכַלּ֤וֹת <WH3615> upon them to accomplish אַפִּי֙ <WH639> my anger בָּהֶ֔ם בְּת֖וֹךְ <WH8432> against them in the midst אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וָאַ֙עַשׂ֙ <WH6213> But I wrought לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake שְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> that it הֵחֵ֛ל <WH2490> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> before הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <WH1471> the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom הֵ֣מָּה <WH1992> like בְתוֹכָ֑ם <WH8432> among אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> whose נוֹדַ֤עְתִּי <WH3045> I made myself known אֲלֵיהֶם֙ <WH413> about לְעֵ֣ינֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5869> whom they [were] in whose sight לְהוֹצִיאָ֖ם <WH3318> unto them in bringing them forth מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וָאֽוֹצִיאֵ֖ם <WH3318> Wherefore I caused them to go forth מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וָאֲבִאֵ֖ם <WH935> and brought אֶל־ <WH413> into הַמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> them into the wilderness

וָאֶתֵּ֤ן <WH5414> And I gave לָהֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <WH2708> them my statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֖י <WH4941> them my judgments הוֹדַ֣עְתִּי <WH3045> and shewed אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֥ה <WH6213> do אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> הָאָדָ֖ם <WH120> which [if] a man וָחַ֥י <WH2425> he shall even live בָּהֶֽם׃

וְגַ֤ם <WH1571> Also אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַי֙ <WH7676> them my sabbaths נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> Moreover also I gave לָהֶ֔ם לִהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> to be a לְא֔וֹת <WH226> to be a sign בֵּינִ֖י <WH996> between וּבֵֽינֵיהֶ֑ם <WH996> between לָדַ֕עַת <WH3045> between me and them that they might know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD מְקַדְּשָֽׁם׃ <WH6942> that sanctify

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <WH4784> rebelled בִ֨י בֵֽית־ <WH1004> But the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel בַּמִּדְבָּ֗ר <WH4057> against me in the wilderness בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֨י <WH2708> not in my statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הָלָ֜כוּ <WH1980> they walked וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <WH4941> my judgments מָאָ֗סוּ <WH3988> and they despised אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> do אֹתָ֤ם <WH853> הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> which [if] a man וָחַ֣י <WH2425> he shall even live בָּהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <WH7676> in them and my sabbaths חִלְּל֣וּ <WH2490> polluted מְאֹ֑ד <WH3966> they greatly וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֨ךְ <WH8210> I would pour out חֲמָתִ֧י <WH2534> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> on בַּמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> upon them in the wilderness לְכַלּוֹתָֽם׃ <WH3615> to consume

וָאֶעֱשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> But I wrought לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> that it הֵחֵל֙ <WH2490> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> before הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whose הוֹצֵאתִ֖ים <WH3318> I brought them out לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in whose sight

וְגַם־ <WH1571> Also אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I נָשָׂ֧אתִי <WH5375> Yet also I lifted up יָדִ֛י <WH3027> my hand לָהֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> unto them in the wilderness לְבִלְתִּי֩ <WH1115> not הָבִ֨יא <WH935> that I would not bring אוֹתָ֜ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֣רֶץ <WH776> them into the land אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָתַ֗תִּי <WH5414> which I had given זָבַ֤ת <WH2100> [them] flowing חָלָב֙ <WH2461> with milk וּדְבַ֔שׁ <WH1706> and honey צְבִ֥י <WH6643> which [is] the glory הִ֖יא <WH1931> which לְכָל־ <WH3605> of all הָאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> of all lands

יַ֜עַן <WH3282> because בְּמִשְׁפָּטַ֣י <WH4941> my judgments מָאָ֗סוּ <WH3988> Because they despised וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֻקּוֹתַי֙ <WH2708> not in my statutes לֹא־ <WH3808> did not הָלְכ֣וּ <WH1980> and walked בָהֶ֔ם וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <WH2490> but polluted כִּ֛י <WH3588> for אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after גִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> their idols לִבָּ֥ם <WH3820> for their heart הֹלֵֽךְ׃ <WH1980> went

וַתָּ֧חָס <WH2347> spared עֵינִ֛י <WH5869> Nevertheless mine eye עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and מִֽשַּׁחֲתָ֑ם <WH7843> them from destroying וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not עָשִׂ֧יתִי <WH6213> them neither did I make אוֹתָ֛ם <WH853> כָּלָ֖ה <WH3617> an end בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> of them in the wilderness

וָאֹמַ֤ר <WH559> But I said אֶל־ <WH413> to בְּנֵיהֶם֙ <WH1121> unto their children בַּמִּדְבָּ֔ר <WH4057> in the wilderness בְּחוּקֵּ֤י <WH2706> ye not in the statutes אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> of your fathers אַל־ <WH408> not תֵּלֵ֔כוּ <WH1980> walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפְּטֵיהֶ֖ם <WH4941> their judgments אַל־ <WH408> not תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <WH8104> neither observe וּבְגִלּוּלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH1544> yourselves with their idols אַל־ <WH408> not תִּטַּמָּֽאוּ׃ <WH2930> nor defile

אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I am יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֔ם <WH430> your God בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֖י <WH2708> in my statutes לֵ֑כוּ <WH1980> walk וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֥י <WH4941> my judgments שִׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> and keep וַעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> and do אוֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths קַדֵּ֑שׁוּ <WH6942> And hallow וְהָי֤וּ <WH1961> shall be a לְאוֹת֙ <WH226> and they shall be a sign בֵּינִ֣י <WH996> between וּבֵֽינֵיכֶ֔ם <WH996> between לָדַ֕עַת <WH3045> between me and you that ye may know כִּ֛י <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH430> your God

וַיַּמְרוּ־ <WH4784> rebelled בִ֣י הַבָּנִ֗ים <WH1121> Notwithstanding the children בְּחֻקּוֹתַ֣י <WH2708> not in my statutes לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor הָ֠לָכוּ <WH1980> against me they walked וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִשְׁפָּטַ֨י <WH4941> my judgments לֹא־ <WH3808> nor שָׁמְר֜וּ <WH8104> neither kept לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> to do אוֹתָ֗ם <WH853> אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> which יַעֲשֶׂ֨ה <WH6213> do אוֹתָ֤ם <WH853> הָֽאָדָם֙ <WH120> them which [if] a man וָחַ֣י <WH2425> he shall even live בָּהֶ֔ם אֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <WH2490> in them they polluted וָאֹמַ֞ר <WH559> then I said לִשְׁפֹּ֧ךְ <WH8210> I would pour out חֲמָתִ֣י <WH2534> my fury עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <WH5921> on לְכַלּ֥וֹת <WH3615> upon them to accomplish אַפִּ֛י <WH639> my anger בָּ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּֽר׃ <WH4057> against them in the wilderness

וַהֲשִׁבֹ֙תִי֙ <WH7725> Nevertheless I withdrew אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> mine hand וָאַ֖עַשׂ <WH6213> and wrought לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> the sake שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> for my name's לְבִלְתִּ֤י <WH1115> that it הֵחֵל֙ <WH2490> sake that it should not be polluted לְעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whose הוֹצֵ֥אתִי <WH3318> I brought them forth אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְעֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> in whose sight

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also אֲנִ֗י <WH589> I נָשָׂ֧אתִי <WH5375> I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֛י <WH3027> mine hand לָהֶ֖ם בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> unto them also in the wilderness לְהָפִ֤יץ <WH6327> that I would scatter אֹתָם֙ <WH853> בַּגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> them among the heathen וּלְזָר֥וֹת <WH2219> and disperse אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> בָּאֲרָצֽוֹת׃ <WH776> them through the countries

יַ֜עַן <WH3282> because מִשְׁפָּטַ֤י <WH4941> my judgments לֹֽא־ <WH3808> had not עָשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> Because they had not executed וְחֻקּוֹתַ֣י <WH2708> my statutes מָאָ֔סוּ <WH3988> but had despised וְאֶת־ <WH853> שַׁבְּתוֹתַ֖י <WH7676> my sabbaths חִלֵּ֑לוּ <WH2490> and had polluted וְאַחֲרֵי֙ <WH310> were after גִּלּוּלֵ֣י <WH1544> idols אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> their fathers' הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become עֵינֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH5869> and their eyes

וְגַם־ <WH1571> also אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I נָתַ֣תִּי <WH5414> Wherefore I gave לָהֶ֔ם חֻקִּ֖ים <WH2706> them also statutes לֹ֣א <WH3808> were not טוֹבִ֑ים <WH2896> [that were] not good וּמִ֨שְׁפָּטִ֔ים <WH4941> and judgments לֹ֥א <WH3808> not יִֽחְי֖וּ <WH2421> whereby they should not live בָּהֶֽם׃

וָאֲטַמֵּ֤א <WH2930> And I polluted אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> בְּמַתְּנוֹתָ֔ם <WH4979> them in their own gifts בְּהַעֲבִ֖יר <WH5674> in that they caused to pass through כָּל־ <WH3605> all פֶּ֣טֶר <WH6363> [the fire] all that openeth רָ֑חַם <WH7356> the womb לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> so אֲשִׁמֵּ֔ם <WH8074> that I might make them desolate לְמַ֙עַן֙ <WH4616> order אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> they יֵֽדְע֔וּ <WH3045> to the end that they might know אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD ס

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore דַּבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> speak אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel בֶּן־ <WH1121> Therefore son אָדָ֔ם <WH120> of man וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and say אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> to כֹּ֥ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֖ר <WH559> unto them Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD ע֗וֹד <WH5750> Yet זֹ֚את <WH2063> likewise גִּדְּפ֤וּ <WH1442> have blasphemed אוֹתִי֙ <WH853> אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> Yet in this your fathers בְּמַעֲלָ֥ם <WH4604> a trespass בִּ֖י מָֽעַל׃ <WH4603> me in that they have committed

וָאֲבִיאֵם֙ <WH935> [For] when I had brought אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> them into the land אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <WH5375> [for] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> mine hand לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לָהֶ֑ם וַיִּרְאוּ֩ <WH7200> it to them then they saw כָל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֨ה <WH1389> hill רָמָ֜ה <WH7311> every high וְכָל־ <WH3605> and every עֵ֣ץ <WH6086> trees עָבֹ֗ת <WH5687> and all the thick וַיִּזְבְּחוּ־ <WH2076> and they offered שָׁ֤ם <WH8033> there אֶת־ <WH853> זִבְחֵיהֶם֙ <WH2077> there their sacrifices וַיִּתְּנוּ־ <WH5414> and there they presented שָׁם֙ <WH8033> and there כַּ֣עַס <WH3708> the provocation קָרְבָּנָ֔ם <WH7133> of their offering וַיָּשִׂ֣ימוּ <WH7760> there also they made שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> There רֵ֚יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיח֣וֹחֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5207> their sweet וַיַּסִּ֥יכוּ <WH5258> and poured out שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> and there אֶת־ <WH853> נִסְכֵּיהֶֽם׃ <WH5262> there their drink offerings

וָאֹמַ֣ר <WH559> Then I said אֲלֵהֶ֔ם <WH413> to מָ֣ה <WH4100> What הַבָּמָ֔ה <WH1116> unto them What [is] the high place אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> to which אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> ye הַבָּאִ֖ים <WH935> whereunto ye go שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> in it וַיִּקָּרֵ֤א <WH7121> thereof is called שְׁמָהּ֙ <WH8034> ? And the name בָּמָ֔ה <WH1117> Bamah עַ֖ד <WH5704> this הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> to this

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> Therefore אֱמֹ֣ר ׀ <WH559> Wherefore say אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> unto the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּ֤ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַר֙ <WH559> Thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD הַבְּדֶ֥רֶךְ <WH1870> after the manner אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH1> of your fathers אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> will you נִטְמְאִ֑ים <WH2930> Are ye polluted וְאַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> after שִׁקּוּצֵיהֶ֖ם <WH8251> their detestable אַתֶּ֥ם <WH859> you זֹנִֽים׃ <WH2181> and play

וּבִשְׂאֵ֣ת <WH5375> For when ye offer מַתְּנֹֽתֵיכֶ֡ם <WH4979> your gifts בְּֽהַעֲבִיר֩ <WH5674> to pass through בְּנֵיכֶ֨ם <WH1121> when ye make your sons בָּאֵ֜שׁ <WH784> the fire אַתֶּם֩ <WH859> you נִטְמְאִ֤֨ים <WH2930> ye pollute לְכָל־ <WH3605> all גִּלּֽוּלֵיכֶם֙ <WH1544> yourselves with all your idols עַד־ <WH5704> to this הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> even unto this day וַאֲנִ֛י <WH589> and shall I אִדָּרֵ֥שׁ <WH1875> and shall I be enquired לָכֶ֖ם בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of by you O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel חַי־ <WH2416> age אָ֗נִי <WH589> I נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo אִדָּרֵ֖שׁ <WH1875> I will not be enquired לָכֶֽם׃

וְהָֽעֹלָה֙ <WH5927> And that which cometh עַל־ <WH5921> into ר֣וּחֲכֶ֔ם <WH7307> into your mind הָי֖וֹ <WH1961> We will be לֹ֣א <WH3808> will not תִֽהְיֶ֑ה <WH1961> come אֲשֶׁ֣ר ׀ <WH834> when אַתֶּ֣ם <WH859> you אֹמְרִ֗ים <WH559> shall not be at all that ye say נִֽהְיֶ֤ה <WH1961> come כַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> as the heathen כְּמִשְׁפְּח֣וֹת <WH4940> as the families הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> of the countries לְשָׁרֵ֖ת <WH8334> to serve עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> wood וָאָֽבֶן׃ <WH68> and stone

חַי־ <WH2416> [As] I live אָ֕נִי <WH589> I נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֑ה <WH3069> GOD אִם־ <WH518> lo לֹ֠א <WH3808> not בְּיָ֨ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָ֜ה <WH2389> surely with a mighty וּבִזְר֧וֹעַ <WH2220> arm נְטוּיָ֛ה <WH5186> and with a stretched out וּבְחֵמָ֥ה <WH2534> and with fury שְׁפוּכָ֖ה <WH8210> poured out אֶמְל֥וֹךְ <WH4427> will I rule עֲלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH5921> over

וְהוֹצֵאתִ֤י <WH3318> And I will bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <WH6908> and will gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> where נְפוֹצֹתֶ֖ם <WH6327> wherein ye are scattered בָּ֑ם בְּיָ֤ד <WH3027> hand חֲזָקָה֙ <WH2389> with a mighty וּבִזְר֣וֹעַ <WH2220> arm נְטוּיָ֔ה <WH5186> and with a stretched out וּבְחֵמָ֖ה <WH2534> and with fury שְׁפוּכָֽה׃ <WH8210> poured out

וְהֵבֵאתִ֣י <WH935> And I will bring אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into מִדְבַּ֖ר <WH4057> you into the wilderness הָֽעַמִּ֑ים <WH5971> of the people וְנִשְׁפַּטְתִּ֤י <WH8199> and there will I plead אִתְּכֶם֙ <WH854> for שָׁ֔ם <WH8033> and there פָּנִ֖ים <WH6440> with you face אֶל־ <WH413> to פָּנִֽים׃ <WH6440> to face

כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> I נִשְׁפַּ֙טְתִּי֙ <WH8199> Like as I pleaded אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> with your fathers בְּמִדְבַּ֖ר <WH4057> in the wilderness אֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> of the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so אִשָּׁפֵ֣ט <WH8199> so will I plead אִתְּכֶ֔ם <WH854> for נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> with you saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD

וְהַעֲבַרְתִּ֥י <WH5674> And I will cause you to pass אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> under הַשָּׁ֑בֶט <WH7626> under the rod וְהֵבֵאתִ֥י <WH935> and I will bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> בְּמָסֹ֥רֶת <WH4562> you into the bond הַבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> of the covenant

וּבָרוֹתִ֣י <WH1305> And I will purge out מִכֶּ֗ם <WH4480> at הַמֹּרְדִ֤ים <WH4775> from among you the rebels וְהַפּֽוֹשְׁעִים֙ <WH6586> and them that transgress בִּ֔י מֵאֶ֤רֶץ <WH776> out of the country מְגֽוּרֵיהֶם֙ <WH4033> where they sojourn אוֹצִ֣יא <WH3318> against me I will bring them forth אוֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְאֶל־ <WH413> about אַדְמַ֥ת <WH127> into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֹ֣א <WH3808> they will not יָב֑וֹא <WH935> and they shall not enter וִֽידַעְתֶּ֖ם <WH3045> and ye shall know כִּי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֥י <WH589> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD

וְאַתֶּ֨ם <WH859> O בֵּֽית־ <WH1004> As for you O house יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> of Israel כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר ׀ <WH559> thus saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהֹוִ֗ה <WH3069> GOD אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> ye every one גִּלּוּלָיו֙ <WH1544> his idols לְכ֣וּ <WH1980> Go עֲבֹ֔דוּ <WH5647> ye serve וְאַחַ֕ר <WH310> and hereafter אִם־ <WH518> lo אֵינְכֶ֖ם <WH369> else שֹׁמְעִ֣ים <WH8085> [also] if ye will not hearken אֵלָ֑י <WH413> about וְאֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> name קָדְשִׁי֙ <WH6944> ye my holy לֹ֣א <WH3808> no תְחַלְּלוּ־ <WH2490> unto me but pollute ע֔וֹד <WH5750> longer בְּמַתְּנֽוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4979> no more with your gifts וּבְגִלּוּלֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1544> and with your idols

כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְהַר־ <WH2022> mountain קָדְשִׁ֞י <WH6944> For in mine holy בְּהַ֣ר ׀ <WH2022> in the mountain מְר֣וֹם <WH4791> of the height יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻם֙ <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֣י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִ֔ה <WH3069> GOD שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there יַעַבְדֻ֜נִי <WH5647> serve כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֧ית <WH1004> there shall all the house יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> of Israel כֻּלֹּ֖ה <WH3605> all בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> all of them in the land שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there אֶרְצֵ֔ם <WH7521> me there will I accept וְשָׁ֞ם <WH8033> and there אֶדְר֣וֹשׁ <WH1875> them and there will I require אֶת־ <WH853> תְּרוּמֹֽתֵיכֶ֗ם <WH8641> your offerings וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֵאשִׁ֛ית <WH7225> and the firstfruits מַשְׂאוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4864> of your oblations בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all קָדְשֵׁיכֶֽם׃ <WH6944> with all your holy things

בְּרֵ֣יחַ <WH7381> savour נִיחֹחַ֮ <WH5207> you with your sweet אֶרְצֶ֣ה <WH7521> I will accept אֶתְכֶם֒ <WH853> בְּהוֹצִיאִ֤י <WH3318> when I bring you out אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣עַמִּ֔ים <WH5971> from the people וְקִבַּצְתִּ֣י <WH6908> and gather אֶתְכֶ֔ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> from הָ֣אֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> you out of the countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> where נְפֹצֹתֶ֖ם <WH6327> wherein ye have been scattered בָּ֑ם וְנִקְדַּשְׁתִּ֥י <WH6942> and I will be sanctified בָכֶ֖ם לְעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in you before הַגּוֹיִֽם׃ <WH1471> the heathen

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בַּהֲבִיאִ֥י <WH935> when I shall bring אֶתְכֶ֖ם <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> into אַדְמַ֣ת <WH127> you into the land יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> into הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> into the country אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> which נָשָׂ֙אתִי֙ <WH5375> [for] the which I lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> יָדִ֔י <WH3027> mine hand לָתֵ֥ת <WH5414> to give אוֹתָ֖הּ <WH853> לַאֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1> it to your fathers

וּזְכַרְתֶּם־ <WH2142> And there shall ye remember שָׁ֗ם <WH8033> There אֶת־ <WH853> דַּרְכֵיכֶם֙ <WH1870> your ways וְאֵת֙ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עֲלִיל֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH5949> and all your doings אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which נִטְמֵאתֶ֖ם <WH2930> wherein ye have been defiled בָּ֑ם וּנְקֹֽטֹתֶם֙ <WH6962> and ye shall lothe בִּפְנֵיכֶ֔ם <WH6440> yourselves in your own sight בְּכָל־ <WH3605> for all רָעוֹתֵיכֶ֖ם <WH7451> for all your evils אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עֲשִׂיתֶֽם׃ <WH6213> that ye have committed

וִֽידַעְתֶּם֙ <WH3045> And ye shall know כִּֽי־ <WH3588> that אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> that I [am] the LORD בַּעֲשׂוֹתִ֥י <WH6213> when I have wrought אִתְּכֶ֖ם <WH854> for לְמַ֣עַן <WH4616> sake שְׁמִ֑י <WH8034> with you for my name's לֹא֩ <WH3808> not כְדַרְכֵיכֶ֨ם <WH1870> ways הָרָעִ֜ים <WH7451> sake not according to your wicked וְכַעֲלִילֽוֹתֵיכֶ֤ם <WH5949> doings הַנִּשְׁחָתוֹת֙ <WH7843> nor according to your corrupt בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> O ye house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel נְאֻ֖ם <WH5002> saith אֲדֹנָ֥י <WH136> the Lord יְהוִֽה׃ <WH3069> GOD פ
